name: Interactive Bio Card
description: Build a complete profile card generator that collects personal information and formats it into a styled, multi-line bio card. This capstone project integrates every concept from Level 1 — print(), input(), variables, strings, integers, basic math, and string concatenation — into one cohesive program.
learning_goals: Collect multiple pieces of user information with input()
Store and organize data in variables
Combine all Level 1 concepts in a real program

steps.instruction:
Print a welcome banner for the Bio Card Generator. Print these three lines:
+========================+
|   BIO CARD GENERATOR   |
+========================+
steps.hint: Use three separate print() statements, one for each line

steps.instruction:
Collect the user's basic info. Ask for their name, age, and city using input() with these prompts:
'Enter your name: '
'Enter your age: '
'Enter your city: '
Store them in variables: name, age_str, city
steps.hint: Three input() calls, each stored in a variable: name = input('Enter your name: ')
steps.expected_output:
+========================+
|   BIO CARD GENERATOR   |
+========================+
Enter your name: Enter your age: Enter your city:
steps.solution:
name = input('Enter your name: ')
age_str = input('Enter your age: ')
city = input('Enter your city: ')

steps.instruction:
Collect more details. Ask for their favorite hobby and their job title:
'Enter your hobby: '
'Enter your job title: '
Store them in variables: hobby, job
steps.hint: Two more input() calls following the same pattern
steps.expected_output:
+========================+
|   BIO CARD GENERATOR   |
+========================+
Enter your name: Enter your age: Enter your city: Enter your hobby: Enter your job title:
steps.solution:
hobby = input('Enter your hobby: ')
job = input('Enter your job title: ')

steps.instruction:
Convert the age to an integer and calculate some fun facts. Create:
- age = int(age_str)
- days_alive = age * 365
- age_in_months = age * 12
steps.hint: int() converts a string to a number. Then multiply: days = age * 365
steps.expected_output:
+========================+
|   BIO CARD GENERATOR   |
+========================+
Enter your name: Enter your age: Enter your city: Enter your hobby: Enter your job title:
steps.solution:
age = int(age_str)
days_alive = age * 365
age_in_months = age * 12

steps.instruction:
Print a blank line, then start the bio card with a top border and the name. Print:
(blank line)
+------------------------+
  Name: Alice
steps.hint: print() for blank line, print('+---...---+') for border, print('  Name: ' + name)
steps.expected_output:
+========================+
|   BIO CARD GENERATOR   |
+========================+
Enter your name: Enter your age: Enter your city: Enter your hobby: Enter your job title: 
+------------------------+
  Name: Alice

steps.instruction:
Print the age, city, and job lines of the bio card:
  Age: 25
  City: Chicago
  Job: developer
steps.hint: print('  Age: ' + age_str) — use age_str here since print needs strings
steps.expected_output:
+========================+
|   BIO CARD GENERATOR   |
+========================+
Enter your name: Enter your age: Enter your city: Enter your hobby: Enter your job title: 
+------------------------+
  Name: Alice
  Age: 25
  City: Chicago
  Job: developer
steps.solution:
print('  Age: ' + age_str)
print('  City: ' + city)
print('  Job: ' + job)

steps.instruction:
Print the hobby line and a separator:
  Hobby: painting
  ------------------------
steps.expected_output:
+========================+
|   BIO CARD GENERATOR   |
+========================+
Enter your name: Enter your age: Enter your city: Enter your hobby: Enter your job title: 
+------------------------+
  Name: Alice
  Age: 25
  City: Chicago
  Job: developer
  Hobby: painting
  ------------------------

steps.instruction:
Display the fun facts section. Print:
  Fun Facts:
  - You've been alive ~9125 days!
  - That's 300 months!
Use str() to convert the numbers to strings.
steps.hint: print('  - You\'ve been alive ~' + str(days_alive) + ' days!')
steps.expected_output:
+========================+
|   BIO CARD GENERATOR   |
+========================+
Enter your name: Enter your age: Enter your city: Enter your hobby: Enter your job title: 
+------------------------+
  Name: Alice
  Age: 25
  City: Chicago
  Job: developer
  Hobby: painting
  ------------------------
  Fun Facts:
  - You've been alive ~9125 days!
  - That's 300 months!
steps.solution:
print('  Fun Facts:')
print('  - You\'ve been alive ~' + str(days_alive) + ' days!')
print('  - That\'s ' + str(age_in_months) + ' months!')

steps.instruction:
Close the bio card with a bottom border and a farewell message:
+------------------------+

Bio card for Alice created successfully!
steps.hint: print('+---...---+'), then print() for blank line, then the farewell
steps.expected_output:
+========================+
|   BIO CARD GENERATOR   |
+========================+
Enter your name: Enter your age: Enter your city: Enter your hobby: Enter your job title: 
+------------------------+
  Name: Alice
  Age: 25
  City: Chicago
  Job: developer
  Hobby: painting
  ------------------------
  Fun Facts:
  - You've been alive ~9125 days!
  - That's 300 months!
+------------------------+

Bio card for Alice created successfully!
steps.solution:
print('+------------------------+')
print()
print('Bio card for ' + name + ' created successfully!')

full_solution:
print('+========================+')
print('|   BIO CARD GENERATOR   |')
print('+========================+')
name = input('Enter your name: ')
age_str = input('Enter your age: ')
city = input('Enter your city: ')
hobby = input('Enter your hobby: ')
job = input('Enter your job title: ')
age = int(age_str)
days_alive = age * 365
age_in_months = age * 12
print()
print('+------------------------+')
print('  Name: ' + name)
print('  Age: ' + age_str)
print('  City: ' + city)
print('  Job: ' + job)
print('  Hobby: ' + hobby)
print('  ------------------------')
print('  Fun Facts:')
print('  - You\'ve been alive ~' + str(days_alive) + ' days!')
print('  - That\'s ' + str(age_in_months) + ' months!')
print('+------------------------+')
print()
print('Bio card for ' + name + ' created successfully!')
